about_the_game:
In Dustino 64, go from nobody to a hero as Dustin, a regular guy on a journey through a charming indie platformer inspired by Super Mario 64, on a quest to collect enough Gems to save Queen Merigold.

You'll have a range of abilities, from punching, triple jumping, wall-jumping and sliding, to navigate the world and overcome whatever you find. Along the journey, encounter unique enemies, puzzles and bosses.

Features:

- Sandbox 3D Platformer gameplay

Intends to capture what the classic 3D platformers did right, which is their sandbox levels

- Co-op

Complete the entire game with a friend

- Hub Worlds

Connected hubs similar to what was done in Sonic Adventure

- Inspired Game Design

Inspired by the golden age of 3D platformers such as Mario 64 and Banjo Kazooie

- Lighting Features

N64 like Lighting, Toggle for real shadows, also a Day-Night Cycle

You'll have a range of abilities, from punching, triple jumping, wall-jumping and sliding, to navigate the world and overcome whatever you find. Along the journey, encounter unique enemies, puzzles and bosses.

Features:

Intends to capture what the classic 3D platformers did right, which is their sandbox levels

- Co-op

Complete the entire game with a friend

- Hub Worlds

Connected hubs similar to what was done in Sonic Adventure

- Inspired Game Design

Inspired by the golden age of 3D platformers such as Mario 64 and Banjo Kazooie

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel 4004
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 256
  • DirectX: Version 5.2
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built in Sound Card
  • VR Support: -
  • Additional Notes: -

short_description: An indie 3D platformer inspired by Super Mario 64, go from nobody to a hero as Dustin, through vibrant hub worlds and stages to collect enough Gems to save Queen Merigold.
